game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden deep within the lost city
game.description: Legend has it that the lost city of Eldarath holds the secrets of a long-lost civilization. Brave adventurers, explore the ruins and uncover the truth behind this mystical place.
game.reward: Eldarathian Scroll (+10 Intelligence) and 1000 Gold Pieces

tasks.objective: Gather information about the lost city's location
tasks.description: Talk to Professor Thistlewaite and gather clues about the lost city's whereabouts.
tasks.location: Professor Thistlewaite's Office, University of Wysteria

tasks.objective: Retrieve an ancient map from the Wysteria Archives
tasks.description: Sneak into the Wysteria Archives and retrieve a dusty old map that supposedly leads to Eldarath.
Make your way through the treacherous jungle and find the hidden entrance to the lost city.
tasks.location: Eldarathian Jungle, deep within the ruins
